sentence.Network_en: He caught her arm in a subconscious attempt to detain her.
sentence.Network_cn: 他下意识地抓住她的胳膊想挽留她。

sentence.Network_en: Thank you. We won't detain you any further.
sentence.Network_cn: 非常感谢。我们就不再耽搁您的时间了。

sentence.Network_en: It is against the law to detain you against your will for any length of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论强制扣押多长时间都属违法。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... entertainment 娱乐，款待 detain v 阻拦；拘留 maintain v 维持；坚持.
大学英语六级考试大纲词汇 - 豆丁网 ... detail n. 琐碎，小事 detain vt. 耽搁；扣押，拘留 detective n. 侦探，密探.
扣字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 扣屎盔子〖 discredit〗 扣押〖 detain;holdincustody〗 扣眼,扣眼儿〖 buttonhole〗.
必应 Bing 词典 - 中国领先的中英文在线词典 ... bribe 行贿 detain 拘留；扣留 ordeal 折磨；严峻考验.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... detainer 挽留者 detainment 挽留 detchable 可分离自.
despatch money 快递费detained goods 扣留货物developed countries 发达国家
ship designing department 船舶设计部门ship detained 船被扣押ship dimensions 船舶尺度
字典中久字的解释 ... (4) 等待[ await] (5) 滞留[ be detained] (1) 长久,时间久(跟“暂”相对)[ for a long time; long].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'be afflicted with sickness or infirmity'): from Old French detenir, from a variant of Latin detinere, from de- 'away, aside' + tenere 'to hold'

entry.def: When people such as the police detain someone, they keep them in a place under their control.

example.ex: The act allows police to detain a suspect for up to 48 hours...
example.tran: 该法令允许警方将嫌疑犯扣押最多48小时。

example.ex: He was arrested and detained for questioning.
example.tran: 他遭到逮捕、拘留以接受问讯。

entry.def: To detain someone means to delay them, for example by talking to them.

example.ex: Thank you. We won't detain you any further.
example.tran: 非常感谢。我们就不再耽搁您的时间了。

means.word_mean: 1. deprive of freedom; take into confinement
3. cause to be slowed down or delayed;

sentences.sentence: "Traffic was delayed by the bad weather"
"she delayed the work that she didn't want to perform"

auth_sentence.content: Without motivating why its necessary to detain these people.
auth_sentence.res_content: Without motivating why its necessary to detain these people.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Without motivating why its necessary to detain these people.

auth_sentence.content: What the foul fiend can detain the Master so long?
auth_sentence.res_content: What the foul fiend can detain the Master so long?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What the foul fiend can detain the Master so long?

auth_sentence.content: The successful bidders would detain suspects and respond to incidents.
auth_sentence.res_content: The successful bidders would detain suspects and respond to incidents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The successful bidders would detain suspects and respond to incidents.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =hold,表示"拿住,握住,支撑"; 2. 挽留

stems_affixes.word_buile: attain[v.达到;获得]+able可以……的→adj.可到达的,可得到的
pertain[[v.属于,关于]]男→adj.恰当的;有关的
contain包含,容纳+er表名词→n.容器;集装箱

stems_affixes.value_cn: 款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演
stems_affixes.word_buile: entertain娱乐,招待+ment表名词→n.款待, 娱乐, 娱乐表演

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
stems_affixes.word_buile: retain[[v.适合,保持,保留]]→n.保留,保持,保持力,记忆力
attain[v.达到;获得]+ment表名词→n.完成,成就

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,容纳;容忍,抑制;可被……除尽
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+tain拿住,握住,支撑→全部拿住→包含,容纳
de加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿住,拿下→拘留

stems_affixes.value_cn: 娱乐, 招待, 接受, 怀抱
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入,走进+tain挽留→使……挽留→休息,娱乐

stems_affixes.value_cn: 维修,保养,维持,供养,坚持,主张,支持
stems_affixes.word_buile: main=man+tain拿住,握住,支撑→用手拿住→坚持
ob加强动作+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿到,获得
per始终+tain拿住,握住,支撑→始终拿着→属于,关于
re回来+tain拿住,握住,支撑→拿回来→保留
sus下面+tain握住→在下面握住→支撑

sentences.en: The bad weather detained us for several hours.
sentences.cn: 恶劣的天气耽搁了我们几个小时。

sentences.en: The teacher often detains the lazy pupils at school to do their homework.
sentences.cn: 老师常把懒惰的学生留在学校写作业。

sentences.en: They have detained two men for questioning at the police station.
sentences.cn: 他们将两个人扣留在警察局准备审讯。

sentences.en: Three men were detained as suspects.
sentences.cn: 有三人被当做嫌疑犯拘留。

jushi.english: This matter isn't very important, and shouldn't detain us very long.
jushi.chinese: 这件事情不很重要,不会耽搁我们太久。

jushi.english: As some urgent business detained him, he had to send his secretary on to the meeting.
jushi.chinese: 由于有急事缠身,他只得先派秘书去参加会议。

jushi.english: They have detained two men for questioning at the police station.
jushi.chinese: 他们将两个人扣留在警察局进行审讯。
